Text: YAY! Thank You!

I've got a question.
I've downloaded this game and when I try to save it on my external hard drive it says that some files don't fit.
Have you got any idea how I can fix that?

@Kevinntfw
PS3 External hdd is in NTFS format which cant hold files more than 4gb ... to play this you must copy to internal hdd. Best way is to use "Opensplit" a program which splits files more than 4gb...copy the files after that to the external and using a backup manager copy to the internal hdd ...

@PandaPad The external harddisk format for the PS3 is FAT32 not NFTS. NFTS has no problems with files larger than 4.7 gb. The internal hard disk of the ps3 is formatted in NFTS.
